attributes.action: EU MEMBERSHIP REFERENDUM TO BE BROUGHT FORWARD TO 2016
attributes.additional_details: Lastest Polls and Surveys throughout the United Kingdom have produced result which clearly shows a resounding NO vote on whether to stay in the European Union.
attributes.background: This is a petition to call for the Referendum on the United Kingdoms membership in European Union to be brought forward to 2016.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104838

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
